dict.string: This app needs access to your calendar to manage events through the MCP server.
Full calendar access lets this tool read, update, and reconcile events you select through the MCP server.
Write-only calendar permission enables this tool to create new events without exposing existing calendars.
This app needs access to your reminders to manage tasks through the MCP server.
Full reminder access is required so this tool can read and update selected reminders on your behalf.
Write-only reminder permission enables this tool to add new reminders without revealing your lists.
